SOCE

SOCE

Your ideas and skills take center stage.

SOCE is the best way to organize and enjoy your ideas and skills you already have — and Learn the ones you want. Enjoy all the Engineering life SOCE has to offer on your Mac and PC.

About SOCE

Experience you Seek

SOCE stands for the Society Of Civil Engineers, IIT Kanpur. It has been in existence for more than 3 decades and continues showing its strong presence till the day. It serves as a link between various batches of 'civilians' who have passed out from this institute, professors and anybody remotely related with Civil Engineering@IITK. This site is again an effort to allow free communication and sharing of ideas and information among its members.

Let's Get started

SOCE platform is Compatible for iOS and Android devices.

The recent job by us one always wished for Granted.

With over 100 project ideas and events to choose from, there’s always something great to be a part with SOCE. Here you’ll be able to enjoy a tremendous selection of our content. So get ready to grasp your interests or pitch ideas you’ve been waiting to implement — anytime, anywhere, with no boundation.
